messages.content: Websites, web applications, server-side applications using Node.js, and more.
What does dynamic typing mean in JavaScript?
A variable can be reassigned any type, such as assigning an integer to a string variable.
Yes, it is commonly known as an interpreted language.
How do you add items to an array in JavaScript?
Using methods like push() or concat().
What is the 80/20 rule in this handbook?
It allows you to learn 80% of a topic in 20% of the time.
